name: Web Development
description: Introduction to web development and building web applications.

lessons.name: History of Web Development
lessons.description: A brief history of web development and its evolution.

lessons.name: Web Development Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles and concepts of web development.

lessons.name: Web Application Development
lessons.description: Overview of building web applications and their component.

lessons.name: Front-end Development
lessons.description: Introduction to front-end development technologies and frameworks.

lessons.name: Back-end Development
lessons.description: Introduction to back-end development technologies and frameworks.

name: Database Systems
description: Introduction to database systems and data management.

lessons.name: Introduction to Databases
lessons.description: Overview of database systems and their importance.

lessons.name: Relational Database Management Systems
lessons.description: Introduction to relational database management systems (RDBMS).

lessons.name: Database Design
lessons.description: Principles and techniques for designing databases.

lessons.name: SQL Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic concepts and syntax of Structured Query Language (SQL).

lessons.name: Database Administration
lessons.description: Managing and maintaining database systems.

name: Software Engineering
description: Introduction to software engineering principles and practices.

lessons.name: Software Development Life Cycle
lessons.description: Overview of the software development life cycle and its phases.

lessons.name: Requirements Engineering
lessons.description: Gathering, analyzing, and documenting software requirements.

lessons.name: Software Design
lessons.description: Principles and techniques for designing software systems.

lessons.name: Software Testing
lessons.description: Methods and strategies for testing software applications.

lessons.name: Software Maintenance
lessons.description: Managing and maintaining software systems.

name: Artificial Intelligence
description: Introduction to artificial intelligence and its applications.

lessons.name: Introduction to AI
lessons.description: Overview of artificial intelligence and its history.

lessons.name: Search Algorithms
lessons.description: Techniques for searching and finding solutions in AI.

lessons.name: Machine Learning
lessons.description: Introduction to machine learning algorithms and models.

lessons.name: Natural Language Processing
lessons.description: Processing and understanding human language in AI.

lessons.name: Computer Vision
lessons.description: Techniques for analyzing and understanding visual data in AI.

name: Mobile Development
description: Introduction to mobile app development for various platforms.

lessons.name: Introduction to Mobile Development
lessons.description: Overview of mobile app development and its platforms.

lessons.name: Android Development
lessons.description: Building Android applications using Java or Kotlin.

lessons.name: iOS Development
lessons.description: Building iOS applications using Swift or Objective-C.

lessons.name: Cross-Platform Development
lessons.description: Building mobile apps that work on multiple platforms using frameworks like React Native or Flutter.

lessons.name: Mobile App Testing
lessons.description: Methods and strategies for testing mobile applications.

name: Operating Systems
description: Introduction to operating systems and their components.

lessons.name: Introduction to Operating Systems
lessons.description: Overview of operating systems and their functions.

lessons.name: Process Management
lessons.description: Managing processes and their execution in an operating system.

lessons.name: Memory Management
lessons.description: Managing memory resources in an operating system.

lessons.name: File Systems
lessons.description: Managing file storage and organization in an operating system.

lessons.name: Concurrency and Synchronization
lessons.description: Managing concurrent processes and synchronization in an operating system.

name: Computer Networks
description: Introduction to computer networks and their protocols.

lessons.name: Introduction to Computer Networks
lessons.description: Overview of computer networks and their components.

lessons.name: Network Protocols
lessons.description: Understanding network protocols and their functions.

lessons.name: Network Security
lessons.description: Securing computer networks and preventing unauthorized access.

lessons.name: Wireless Networks
lessons.description: Understanding wireless networks and their technologies.

lessons.name: Network Administration
lessons.description: Managing and maintaining computer networks.
